entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow changing to flurries at times heavy after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
